channel.title: Testing on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Modernization workshop

item.title: AWS Marketplace DevOps Workshop Series Hands-on Lab with CloudBees Feature Management
item.description: Learn how to use CloudBees Feature Management to decouple deployments from releases, experiment with testing on production to improve feedback loops and leverage GitOps to seamlessly synchronize states of feature flags.

item.title: Gitlab DevOps Modernization Workshop
item.description: In this workshop you will learn about the GitLab DevOps platform and how to build, test, and deploy features and functionality at a faster pace.

item.title: Ultimate GitOps - Deploy Secure Microservices to AWS EKS with the GitLab Agent
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn to use the new GitLab Agent for Kubernetes to integrate with EKS more securely and to add GitOps pull deployments. Add GitLab’s mature DevSecOps security scanning, automated review environment management and cluster scanning security to your latest GitOps projects. Learn how the new GitLab Agent cluster connection method improves the security posture for all existing EKS CD push integrations as well.

item.title: AI-Powered Functional Test Automation with Micro Focus UFT One
item.description: This workshop will show you how to use UFT One to design an AI-based functional test of a web application, run the test, and understand the details of each step executed during the test run.

item.title: Scale Android tests with Genymotion
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn how to improve your Android testing infrastructure and scale up and down your tests with Genymotion Android virtual devices

item.title: Build a modern architecture with GitLab, Hashicorp and Gremlin
item.description: In this workshop we will work with GitLab, Hashicorp and Gremlin to show how to detect single points of failure within a gitflow deployment.

item.title: Chaos Engineering with Gremlin
item.description: In this workshop, you will get a hands-on introduction to Chaos Engineering by assuming the role of Mystical Mysfit’s newest site reliability engineer.

item.title: Test Automation with Cognizant
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn from Cognizant how to continuously test an application along different portions of the DevOps CI/CD lifecycle.
